content: प्रकीर्ण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Scattered about, scattered forth, thrown about, dispersed. {@--2@} Spread, published, promulgated. {@--3@} Waved, waving; <ls>Śi. 12. 17.</ls> {@--4@} Disordered, loose, dishevelled. {@--5@} Confused, incoherent; बह्वपि स्वेच्छया कामं प्रकीर्णमभिधीयते <ls>Śi. 2. 63.</ls> {@--6@} Agitated, excited. {@--7@} Miscellaneous, mixed; as the प्रकार्णिकांड of Bhaṭṭikāvya. {@--8@} Expanded, opened. {@--9@} Standing alone. --र्णं {@--1@} A miscellany, any miscellaneous collection. {@--2@} A chapter containing miscellaneous rules. {@--3@} A chapter or section of a book. {@--4@} Scattering or throwing about. {@--5@} Extent.
